sentence: The room was clean and spacious
The location was perfect easy drive to the Oracle Arena with beautiful views of the water
The room was perfect and it had a nice large balcony overlooking the harbor and the pool
Quiet except for the occasional train nice view on the waterside
The food was good and the in room dining staff made changes to my room service order to fit my very specific dietary restrictions
Clean rooms and you can open the windows for fresh air on the harbor side
The service was amazing and there was nice appliances in the rooms and not to mention the amazing view of the bay
The room was very clean and the bed was comfortable
The room was very quiet and comfortable
Also room service is terrific and quick

After the booking I called back again now 2 days away from my reservation and still before the breaking the hotels 48 hour window cancellation policy just to confirm that the reservation was still there and that the penalty was only One additional nights stay
Paid for 2 queen beds but they gave away my room so my tall son had to sleep on dilapidated roll away sofa there was live mosquito in room the upstairs floor creaked and could hear evro
Impressed that patio which had double doors to help make train noise minimal which many reviews complained about
Our only complaint was the room was n’t ready until 430pm and the front guest did n’t apologize for the inconvenience or offer us anything to make our wait more comfortable
Apparently the cleaning crew did not clean the balcony the previous visitor left drug paraphernalia pretty much in plain view
Each room or suite is quite large as large as a medium sized studio
Had to book two rooms did not arrive until midnight had a hard time getting the late check out needed
Neither ever came and we had to roam the halls looking for a housekeeper so we could use the bathroom after waiting over an hour
The floors are very thin and we could hear people in the upstairs unit whenever they walked
Room was cold and did not respond to request to fixSurprise amenity fee on departureEnjoyed wine and cheese
